Class Metric2English

java.lang.Object
Metric2English
public class Metric2English
extends java.lang.Object
This Class converts the Metric inputted value to its English conversion.

  • Method Details

    • convertUnits

      public void convertUnits()
      Splits up the given string to convert. Then takes the Metric value and compares it to the English value. If they are the same unit, then calls the according function to Convert the metric value to english.

    • isMetricLength

      public boolean isMetricLength​(java.lang.String inputMetricUnit)
      Takes the string and makes sure that it is in metric units of Length.
      Parameters:
      inputMetricUnit - the string to check.
      Returns:
      true if inputMetricUnit is a metric unit of type length and false if otherwise.

    • isEnglishLength

      public boolean isEnglishLength​(java.lang.String inputEnglishUnit)
      Takes the string and makes sure that it is in english units of Length.
      Parameters:
      inputEnglishUnit - the string to check.
      Returns:
      true if inputEnglishUnit is a metric unit of type length and false if otherwise.

    • getConversionLength

      private double getConversionLength​(java.lang.String englishUnit, java.lang.String metricUnit, int x)
      Takes the english string and multiplies the metric string by x then converts to english.
      Parameters:
      englishUnit - the english unit string
      metricUnit - the metric unit string
      x - - the amount to multiply by in terms of how many (englishunits are in x metric units)
      Returns:
      a double with the conversion and outputs a phrase with the conversion.

    • isMetricMass

      Returns:

      metricUnit - the metric unit string
